title: Task 5.1.1 — Raw Ontology Download
body:
Implements raw per-ontology Turtle exports.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 5.1.1.1 Expose per-ontology TTL download
- [ ] 5.1.1.2 Validate correct content-type headers
- [ ] 5.1.1.3 Preserve original namespace prefixes
milestone: Phase 5 – Ontology Export, CI/CD & Production Deployment

title: Task 5.1.2 — Merged Ontology Export
body:
Implements merged ontology export.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 5.1.2.1 Merge all imported ontologies into a single graph
- [ ] 5.1.2.2 Export merged ontology as Turtle
- [ ] 5.1.2.3 Maintain import provenance metadata
milestone: Phase 5 – Ontology Export, CI/CD & Production Deployment

title: Task 5.1.3 — JSON Export for Visualization APIs
body:
Implements JSON exports for UI and APIs.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 5.1.3.1 Export class graph as JSON
- [ ] 5.1.3.2 Export property relations as JSON
- [ ] 5.1.3.3 Export individuals as JSON
milestone: Phase 5 – Ontology Export, CI/CD & Production Deployment

Locks system into read-only production mode.

- [ ] 5.4.2.3 Prevent LiveView mutation operations
